    Class
    Description
    ITask
    Represents a task entity in the system.
    Task
    Task entity with immutable identity (id), validated fields, and a behavioral state managed by the TaskState state machine.
    TaskState
    Task lifecycle states implemented as a behavioral enum (State pattern).
